data.what_is: MSP & IT Advantage Programs are a blend of sales and marketing enablement technology with strategy and content to create a comprehensive marketing and sales program for you.
data.product_description: MSP & IT Advantage Programs are a blend of sales and marketing enablement technology with strategy and content to create a comprehensive marketing and sales program for you.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MSP-IT Advantage Program?
I have nothing positive to say about this platform or experience w it

What do you dislike about MSP-IT Advantage Program?
It's absolutely unusable. Outdated. Bad customer service. Impossible to use. Headache inducing. Time wasting. Rude. I can go on

What problems is MSP-IT Advantage Program solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am having problems caused by using this product my productivity has dropped and I spend more time supporting the sales and marketing team in attempting to use it than any other product in our line up

review_question_answers.answer: I have nothing positive to say about this platform or experience w it

review_question_answers.answer: It's absolutely unusable. Outdated. Bad customer service. Impossible to use. Headache inducing. Time wasting. Rude. I can go on

review_question_answers.question: What problems is MSP-IT Advantage Program solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: I am having problems caused by using this product my productivity has dropped and I spend more time supporting the sales and marketing team in attempting to use it than any other product in our line up

initial_reviews.review_title: Best automated marketing and sales platform.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MSP-IT Advantage Program?
I like how easily it connects my LinkedIn, Twitter, and Facebook along with tracking the responses from email and social campaigns with easy to use inbuild reports which can help me identify the prospects and know the actual status of the contacts.

What do you dislike about MSP-IT Advantage Program?
It is great software, but there is no integration available for publishing content on Instagram or YouTube. It is difficult to operate if you need to use this on a mobile phone.

What problems is MSP-IT Advantage Program solving and how is that benefiting you?
MSP-IT advantage provides all online sales and marketing related tools on one platform.

The reports section is really powerful as we can track our progress with contacts and companies. Website tracking, social media responses, and email-related activities are great tools for us to target prospects with high-level interest.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about MSP-IT Advantage Program?
review_question_answers.answer: I like how easily it connects my LinkedIn, Twitter, and Facebook along with tracking the responses from email and social campaigns with easy to use inbuild reports which can help me identify the prospects and know the actual status of the contacts.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about MSP-IT Advantage Program?
review_question_answers.answer: It is great software, but there is no integration available for publishing content on Instagram or YouTube. It is difficult to operate if you need to use this on a mobile phone.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is MSP-IT Advantage Program solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
MSP-IT advantage provides all online sales and marketing related tools on one platform.

The reports section is really powerful as we can track our progress with contacts and companies. Website tracking, social media responses, and email-related activities are great tools for us to target prospects with high-level interest.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MSP-IT Advantage Program?
The lead management section it has along with its ability to integrate with Salesforce is a big plus.
The cost is reasonable compared to other marketing softwares out there.

What do you dislike about MSP-IT Advantage Program?
Not much customization is available in terms of User interface or any other customizations in terms of widgets.
Would require deep knowledge to run the software with ease.

What problems is MSP-IT Advantage Program solving and how is that benefiting you?
Ability to run multiple email drip campaigns.
Running multiple social media campaigns and maintaining a database of leads within the software.
Can create custom roles and assign users based on their access levels.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about MSP-IT Advantage Program?
review_question_answers.answer:
The lead management section it has along with its ability to integrate with Salesforce is a big plus.
The cost is reasonable compared to other marketing softwares out there.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about MSP-IT Advantage Program?
review_question_answers.answer:
Not much customization is available in terms of User interface or any other customizations in terms of widgets.
Would require deep knowledge to run the software with ease.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is MSP-IT Advantage Program solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
Ability to run multiple email drip campaigns.
Running multiple social media campaigns and maintaining a database of leads within the software.
Can create custom roles and assign users based on their access levels.

initial_reviews.review_title: Good for beginners to intermediate level.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MSP-IT Advantage Program?
The low cost, the pre-canned content, and the ease of use.

What do you dislike about MSP-IT Advantage Program?
Limited content options for certain niches, bit of a learning curve.

What problems is MSP-IT Advantage Program solving and how is that benefiting you?
Social marketing, email marketing on a budget. Helps start you off in the right direction if you're looking for an automated online marketing platform.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about MSP-IT Advantage Program?
review_question_answers.answer: The low cost, the pre-canned content, and the ease of use.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about MSP-IT Advantage Program?
review_question_answers.answer: Limited content options for certain niches, bit of a learning curve.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is MSP-IT Advantage Program solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Social marketing, email marketing on a budget. Helps start you off in the right direction if you're looking for an automated online marketing platform.

initial_reviews.review_title: MindMatrix is a great marketing partner with bright, knowledgable, motivated employees.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about MSP-IT Advantage Program?
Laura Estes has helped us with our MSP Advantage email campaigns, making sure there is measurable impact to our out-bound marketing strategies and web site analytics.

What do you dislike about MSP-IT Advantage Program?
I find nothing to dislike. It works, their team members work hard, and they have developed a valuable resource for companies like ours.

What problems is MSP-IT Advantage Program solving and how is that benefiting you?
Enabling our team to distribute good short emails with valuable content often providing a link with landing page for newsletter signups and IT tips and alerts.
